                A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas (2011)               
   Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold   
   Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning  
           down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

                         Encoder/Ripper: SMiLE                         
                                                                        
   Simple encode here. We just took the source and dropped it in for    
   conversion, there we ran a few filters and ran our custom encode     
   settings on it. Turned out sweet. Very solid TS here. I must tell    
   you now that it's in 3D, but don't worry it's not in the whole of    
   the movie and it only makes the video go blurry for a small amount   
   of time, that's the only main flaw with this one, didn't effect my   
   viewing pleasure. The audio is very sweet, just a little hiss and    
   distortion here and there - still better than most. Enjoy! 
